description:
A lightweight, powder and freeride hybrid splitboard for human-powered snow surfing. The Ecplise has a wide nose and narrow tail for optimal float in the soft stuff, and a multi-radial profile for agility in tight trees. A powerful core of poplar and bamboo keeps this board smooth and surfy while tip to tail carbon stringers give it a little extra pop. It's held together with Karakoram Ultraclips that maintain compression between sides, even as the board ages.

  • Poplar and bamboo wood core is energetic and damping
  • Carbon fibre stringers from tip to tail provides stiffness and pop
  • Castor bean top sheet sheds snow, adds impact resistance and is eco-friendly
  • Triaxial fibreglass offers a good balance of flex and torsional control
  • Polyurethane sidewall construction increases torsional stability
  • Directional multi-radial camber-rocker profile provides control on big lines
  • Karakorum UltraClips 2.0 tip and tail clips give you a solid riding feel
  • Sintered 4000 base has great wax retention for a fast ride
name: Weston Eclipse Splitboard - Unisex
